body.p: Maven 2.x comes bundled with an Eclipse plugin that allows you to easily maintain your .classpath file based on your pom.xml. This guide will walk you through the steps of setting this up for the first time and continual usage there after.
body.note:
For additional information on the Eclipse plugin from maven, you may visit their
online documentation .
